overview: Jenna's discovered her own little slice of paradise. A place where all her wildest fantasies and secret desires are realized. Take a trip with her and see what it's like to reach the ultimate In sexual fulfillment. She's joined by several hot babes all eager to shed their inhibitions and explore their deepest sexual urges with smokin' threeways, some hot girl/girl action and an orgy that'll leave your beggin for more. Shot in exotic locations by award winning director Brad Armstrong. You'll want to stay in 'Paradise' forever. If you need to get away, let Jenna show the path to Paradise...
title: Paradise
